Hydras::

the alarms rang showing that intruders are around the base, Hydras 
broke that magic moment and said "It's time to receive our guest 
Maxima, we should give them welcoem that they won't forget it..."

Hydras took his weapon and moved towards exit, while he motioned the 
femme do the same.

Soon he will be outside facing those intruders.


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic" <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:
> Meanwhile, Aries soon made his way up a hill and found out where
> Dracon had ordered him to go.
> 
> Aries: By all the corpses I've devoured! You brought me in the 
defense
> perimeter of that base! What went on in your mind?
> 
> Leo wanted to have a word. The bot transformed and the feline head
> took the lead.
> 
> Leo: No! We doesn't want to go there! Bad place! Not for usses! We 
no
> like Dracon, stupid beasts!
> 
> Dracon roared and the dragon head suddenly came to life.
> 
> Dracon: Silence, you pathetic critter! When I say we go there, we 
go
> there!
> 
> Leo cowered back in place, but was still not very confident about 
what
> to do.
> 
> Leo: Ssssstop it! We goes for now... don't shout no more, 
pleasssssse!
> 
> He slowly walked nearer to the base, but he didn't know quite qhat 
to
> do then.
> 
> Leo: Happy, now, Dracon? Those bad-eyed machines see usses now... 
We
> no enemies, nice machineses...
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:

> >
